mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_type = #{sysType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_state = #{sysState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity = #{activity,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_no, real_name, username, password, mobile, email, sys_type, sys_state, activity, create_time, creater_id, modify_time, modifier_id, remark from t_sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
